course_description: Learn Python from scratch: variables to functions, files to libraries, and build real mini-projects in just one weekend.
course_overview: This hands-on course takes absolute beginners from zero to confident Python scripting. You will set up a modern development environment, master core syntax, control flow, data structures, functions, and modules, then apply skills to automate tasks, manipulate files, consume APIs, and create simple games. Interactive labs, auto-graded exercises, and a capstone project reinforce every concept while cultivating professional coding practices such as debugging, version control, and virtual environments.
target_audience: Aspiring programmers, data-curious professionals, and students with no prior coding experience who want a practical jump-start into tech.
learning_outcomes: Install and configure Python 3 and Visual Studio Code
Apply variables, operators, and built-in data types to solve arithmetic and string problems
Construct programs using conditionals and loops to control execution flow
Create and call reusable functions with parameters and return values
Manipulate lists, tuples, sets, and dictionaries to store and retrieve data
Read from and write to text files and CSV files with error handling
Import and utilize standard-library modules to automate OS and web tasks
Debug syntax and runtime errors using IDE tools and stack traces
Complete a capstone project that integrates course concepts into a working application
